column1: Saradoc "Scattergold" Brandybuck was a Hobbits and Master of Buckland.
Saradoc was the son of Rorimac Brandybuck. He married Esmeralda Took
column4: who joined the Fellowship of the Ring. With his father
column6: he was present at Bilbos Farewell Party.
